title: Director Tries To Keep Guantanamo Politics Out Of 'Camp X-Ray'
teaser: In a new movie, Camp X-Ray, Kristen Stewart plays a guard at Guantanamo who lets one of the detainees get to her. NPR's Scott Simon talks to director Peter Sattler about his first feature film.
